paper.title: A novel cryptocurrency price trend forecasting model based on LightGBM
paper.abstract: Forecasting cryptocurrency prices is crucial for investors. In this paper, we adopt a novel Gradient Boosting Decision Tree (GBDT) algorithm, Light Gradient Boosting Machine (LightGBM), to forecast the price trend (falling, or not falling) of cryptocurrency market. In order to utilize market information, we combine the daily data of 42 kinds of primary cryptocurrencies with key economic indicators. Results show that the robustness of the LightGBM model is better than the other methods, and the comprehensive strength of the cryptocurrencies impacts the forecasting performance. This can effectively guide investors in constructing an appropriate cryptocurrency portfolio and mitigate risks.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是使用LightGBM模型预测加密货币价格趋势，目的是指导投资者构建适当的加密货币投资组合并降低风险，这属于投资组合管理的范畴。
